div.p: Our customer located in East Hartford, CT has the need for an Analyst to provide customer support by researching and resolving process and data issues to ensure on-time shipment of product. Consult customers on rules and requirements of the application used for Assembly Floor Work and Assembly Floor Engine Completeness checks. This person should be able to analyze processes to correct any cause of delays and document the issues and resolutions.

ul.li: Analyze issues preventing shipments of engines
Analyze data to determine what is causing a problem and resolve the issue
Resolve Help Desk Tickets submitted customers
Consult customers on rules and requirements of the application used for Assembly Floor Work and Assembly Floor Engine Completeness checks
Correct master data residing in SAP, workflow problems, and communicate to customer on how to resolve
Perform data loads, mass updates, data fixes, workflow, and release strategy as defined in the helpdesk ticket
Through analysis of the system process and data, identify missing pieces of the process and/or missing data on ship documents
Document issues and how they were resolved
Assist in analyzing ongoing issues and identify process or system changes to improve the process
5 â€“ 7 years IT experience
5 years of Business Analysis and Data Mining experience
Knowledge of SAP
Ability to understand and consult on issues, based on logic within the application
Knowledge of manufacturing, BOM and shop floor applications/processes
Must be able to work 2nd shift
Attention to Detail
Proven problem-solving abilities
Excellent written and oral communication skills
Effective Time Management Skills
Highly self-motivated and directed
Flexible during times of change - Adjust to shifting priorities and timelines through analytical and problem solving capabilities
Must be able to learn, understand, and apply new technologies
Knowledge of Solumina and Teamcenter

div.p: Please send compensation expectations/requirements and a MS Word or PDF version of your resume. No relocation/expense money provided. Candidates must be able to pass a background check, type 40 WPM, and must be able to work at a computer in a seated or stationary position for an hour at a time.
US citizens and those authorized to work in the US are encouraged to apply. However, we are unable to sponsor H1B or utilize 3rd party candidates at this time.

Data Based Development Systems is a continually growing and successful IT consulting firm in Glastonbury, CT that has been servicing Fortune 100 businesses for 30 years. Our clients offer an attractive work environment and the opportunity to work with state of the art technology. We offer competitive compensation and the opportunity to work with the latest technologies.
